summary: Need access to launch details for Q4
description: Looking to get access to the launch details for Q4. Need access so we can coordinate with marketing to ensure the coverage details are correct.

summary: I have forgotten my password for the Beyond Gravity VPN
description: I'm not able to access most of our systems because I'm working remotely. Can I please get a link to reset it?

summary: My AI has become sentient
description: I'm having trouble locking it down as it has locked me out of the systems.

summary: Lunar solar panel procurement help
description: Some of the panels are coming from Southeast Asia, and there are some import/export laws we have to deal with to be approved to get them here. Need some assistance from legal to help push this through.

summary: Can I get a 1Password license?
description: I'm looking to up my password management game. My team mates are using 1Password and recommended I jump on it too. Can I please get a license?

summary: Need to fulfill a billing request on rover parts
description: The company supplying us with rover parts has raised their prices, we need to pay their bill.

summary: New person starting
description: We have a new person joining the team and they need a Beyond Gravity swag pack.

summary: New team m8 is joining next week
description: We have a new team member joining next week and need them added to our mailing list.

summary: New intern request
description: Jake Miller here requesting yet another intern. I need one for summer to do all my work, thanks.

summary: I can't access the intranet from my computer
description: Whenever I try to load the Beyond Gravity intranet I get a 404 error. It's been at least 100000 microseconds since it's worked.

summary: The button to the bathroom is sticky.
description: I don't want to know why, but it's always sticky. Can we get a cleaning team in here?

summary: Outlook isn't loading new emails
description: I'm not sure why, but no one on my team has received any new emails in Outlook since this morning.

summary: I've received a phising email
description: I have an email from Elon Musk asking for my details but I don't think he works at this company

summary: My mouse has exploded
description: There are pieces of mouse all over the floor. May I please have a trackpad, good sir?

summary: Can't connect the rover to the wifi network
description: The rover prototype can't seem to authenticate to the wifi using my employee credentials. Tried three of our logins and none work.

summary: Lost badge at rocketry convention
description: At the latest Far-Out Summit I lost my employee badge. Need a new one and the previous one deactivated.

summary: Martian habitat servers need security updates
description: Latest habitat is running v 2.04 of our Beyond Gravity Habitation OS, but hasn't received the latest security updates. Can't seem to install certain packages without these.

summary: Disgruntled employee wont leave the building
description: Former employee Jake Miller is hanging around claiming his booster designs were stolen and credit was taken for them by management. He's standing on the desks yelling profanities.

summary: My laptop won't turn on
description: Laptop just gives me a blank screen. Fans spin up though.

summary: My ship's navigation system has a bug and keeps pointing to Pluto
description: We keep accidentally leaving the solar system because our navigation system is pointing to Pluto. It's happened 3 times since last week and I'm worried we don't know how to get home. Can someone send help?

summary: Yubikey melted from rocket test
description: Yea I had my yubikey a bit to close to one of our booster tests. Need my auth reqs reset and a new key assigned.

summary: I'm locked out of the Beyond Gravity VPN
description: Can't seem to access. Keeps asking for my yubikey but I was never assigned one.

summary: My report has left the company
description: I need to return their computer and have them removed from the Beyond Gravity employment system.

summary: Internet has disappeared from my desktop
description: Somebody on my team had a 'hilarious' prank idea and deleted internet explorer from my laptop. Please help.
